entry.title: [FR][xDSL/FTTH] - Service degradation
entry.content:
Apr 12, 08:32 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 11/04/2024 07:30 UTC
End time : 12/04/2024 04:00 UTC
Service impact :The situation is back to normal, the service is running nominally.
Root cause : It was due to a disruption on the network.

Apr 11, 12:42 UTC
Monitoring - Start time : 11/04/2024 07:30 UTC
Service impact : Since 07:30 UTC we have been experiencing disruption on the national network, leading to packet losses. We are working with the providers involved and doing our utmost to restore services as quickly as possible.
Ongoing actions : Our teams have fixed the problem and traffic is back to normal. Our teams are monitoring the incident.

Apr 11, 09:08 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 11/04/2024 07:30 UTC
